data.title: Sofia Vergara shares glimpse of 'Modern Family' reunion, says 'so lucky to…'
data.meta_description: The cast of 'Modern Family' gathered for a reunion, with Sofia Vergara sharing several photos on Instagram. However, Ty Burrell was absent from the gathering.
data.text:
The cast of ‘Modern Family’ gathered together under one roof and had an epic reunion. Pictures from this get-together have been going viral on social media and these are proof that the cast indeed had a great time. Actress Sofia Vergara shared several photos and videos on her Instagram account and also called herself lucky to have worked with the other cast members for 11 years.

SOFIA VERGARA SHARE GLIMPSE OF ‘MODERN FAMILY’ REUNION

Sofia Vergara took to Instagram to share a glimpse of the ‘Modern Family’ reunion with her fans. She captioned the first photo as, “First Modern Family reunion!!!! (sic).”

While most of the familiar faces can be seen in the pictures, the one who is missing is Ty Burrell. However, a picture of his character, Phil Dunphy,made up for his absence.

The actress, in another post, also wrote, “So lucky to have worked with this people for 11 year. I love and miss u all guys!!! (sic)”

Ed O'Neill, Julie Bowen, Eric Stonestreet, along with his fiancée Lindsay Schweitzer, and the younger cast members, including Rico Rodriguez, Nolan Gould, and Aubrey Anderson-Emmons, who have now matured, can be spotted in the pictures. The co-creators Christopher Lloyd and Steven Levitan also joined the cast for the reunion.

Ferguson and Stonestreet posted photos of each other on their Instagram stories. Ferguson also commented on one of the posts and wrote, "Thanks for hosting Sofia!!!! Love you.(sic)"

ABOUT ‘MODERN FAMILY’

‘Modern Family’ has been one of the most-loved shows that enjoyed a great viewership. The successful ABC comedy had a run spanning 11 seasons, running from 2009 to 2020. Throughout its 250-episode tenure, this acclaimed sitcom earned a total of 22 Emmys, securing five consecutive wins for best comedy series.
